subject: Re: [junit] class not found exception
msgSnippet: I believe you need a compiled version.  As far as I know, the Ant JUnit task doesn t compile for you. =jason On Tue, 2002-11-26 at 12:53, suresh wrote: hi i am
messageBody:
I believe you need a compiled version. As far as I know, the Ant JUnit
task doesn't compile for you.

=jason

On Tue, 2002-11-26 at 12:53, suresh wrote: hi i am trying to run a Junit
test case from the ant script and i got
following error. All my files are placed in d:\src directory without
any package names. TempTest is name of the class. any suggestions
please ?

<junit printsummary="yes" fork="yes" haltonfailure="no">
<formatter type="plain"/>
<test name="D:/src/TempTest" outfile="result">
</test>
</junit>

</target>

error message:
Testsuite: D:/src/TempTest
Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 0 sec

Caused an ERROR
D:/src/TempTest
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: D:/src/TempTest
at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method)
at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:115)
